logger.doc:name: Log Start Post Notification Event
logger.message: #[vars.correlationid] | Log Start Post Notification Event | Request Payload: #[payload]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "NotificationEventID": payload.notificationEvent.notificationEventId, "EventName": payload.notificationEvent.eventName, "EventDataTags": payload.notificationEvent.eventDataTags, "EventTranslationTags": payload.notificationEvent.eventTranslationTags, "IsActive": if(payload.notificationEvent.isActive) 1 else 0, "InsertedBy": payload.notificationEvent.insertedBy }

logger.doc:name: Log End Post Notification Event
logger.message: #[vars.correlationid] | Log End Post Notification Event | Response Payload: #[payload]
